alert.note: Alert for Kanawha; Northwest Fayette; Northwest Nicholas (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 5:59PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Nicholas, southeastern Kanawha and northwestern Fayette Counties through 630 PM EDT... At 558 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Gauley Bridge, or 9 miles northwest of Fayetteville, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Montgomery, Ansted, Cedar Grove, Glasgow, Smithers, Gauley Bridge, Pratt, Powellton, Hawks Nest State Park, Handley, Swiss, Kesslers Cross Lanes and Drennan. This includes the following highways... West Virginia Turnpike between mile markers 72 and 77. Route 19 between mile markers 20 and 31. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
